title: The Mill on the Floss - The books and authors

content.question: The books and authors mentioned in the first paragraph primarily serve to

choices.label: reveal the continuity between the classics and the new, popular literature
show that Maggie is more stimulated by religious texts than by secular ones
suggest that "that wrinkled fruit of the three of knowledge" was the reason for the Biblical Fall
present Maggie as one drawn to the humanistic world view expressed by Virgil and Euclid

content.answer: show that Maggie is more stimulated by religious texts than by secular ones

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
